headline: Suspicious Package Triggers Police Investigation Near Flatiron
summary: Police cordoned off an area near 23rd Street after a suspicious package was reported. The bomb squad later confirmed it was harmless.

headline: Bike-Pedestrian Collision Sends One to Hospital
summary: A pedestrian was hit by a cyclist near the Flatiron Building this morning. EMS responded quickly and the individual is recovering.

headline: Flatiron Gas Leak Promptly Contained
summary: Firefighters responded to a gas odor complaint on 5th Avenue. No injuries reported and the building was ventilated safely.

headline: Attempted Robbery at Convenience Store Thwarted by Clerk
summary: A robbery attempt near 6th Avenue was stopped when a store clerk triggered a silent alarm. The suspect fled and is being sought.

headline: Graffiti Spree Hits Flatiron Storefronts
summary: Several storefronts along Broadway were defaced overnight. Police are reviewing security footage.
